bike.description: C4 carbon w/ RIB Tech, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, aero seat tube, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: C4 carbon thin seat stays, oversized ETC chainstay, forged alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ RIB Tech, tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Rotor Press-Fit BB86/30 sealed cartridge bearing
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake, 20-speed, Flight Deck compatible
Oval 535 aero alloy, 35mm rims, DT Swiss Competition spokes 20/24H, sealed bearing hubs
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia XR w/ FEC alloy rails
Oval aero carbon w/ 2-bolt clamp system
Oval 700 forged & CNC'd w/ cartridge pads
